MHF3302 - Logic and Proof in Mathematics.name: MHF3302 - Logic and Proof in Mathematics

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Basic mathematical logic. Methods of proof in mathematics. Application of proofs to elementary mathematical structures.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: A chronological study of the evolution of mathematical thought from primitive counting through modern ideas of the 20th century. Recommended for prospective teachers in mathematics.

MHF4934 - Topics in Foundations and Hist.name: MHF4934 - Topics in Foundations and History of Mathematics

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Advanced, specialized topics in the foundations and history of mathematics, ranging from set theory and mathematical logic to the history and development of mathematical theories.
